info.name: ForoMTB Compact
info.description: A few improvements to the new design of ForoMTB.com.
info.additionalInfo:
Version 0.2 - 2013/11/08

- Changed background color to light grey

Version 0.1 - 2013/11/07

- Reduction of total width to 1280px (not liquid)
- Fitting of header to the new width
- Visual separation for comment boxes using a bordered and shadowed box
- Fitting of the "Nuevo" label in comment boxes
- Comment's font changed to Helvetica or system's sans-serif
